name: Your Head is Spinning
description:
Your Head is Spinning

A Bullet Hell game that takes place on the surface of a sphere.

The camera is slowly spinning, and you cannot run away from your problems.

Do you have what it takes to escape this nightmare?

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move. Mouse to aim.

You fire automatically, but enemies regenerate health.

When you die, enemies regenerate fully, but dead ones stay dead.

You cannot lose, but you may get a headache.
